reviews.review_msg: Hey, at least he is fair. I dont know why he has this low of a rating, at least he doesnt go around accusing people of cheating like Layla Cameron. Solid prof overall, you just need to study!

When I read the reviews before taking the prof I was scared cause everyone said he was really horrible but when I took the class, he's not bad at all. he's funny at points, he makes dad jokes haha but of you just stick to what he asks of you then you are good to go. follow his instructions and you will get a good grade. just a bit grumpy

DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS!!!!!!!!!! Worst prof i've ever taken, has a huge ego but not confident and can barely maintain any eye contact. avoids accountability on EVERYTHINGGG. He forces you to buy the book first class and never used it once. He tends to ramble alot but there is no content to his yapping so its just 4 hours of ur day wasted. 0/10 prof
His classes reminded me of life in prison

Follow instructions, Do as he says, and you will be fine. He is scary yes, but tbh I think it is all part of a persona he likes to play during class to frighten students. Don't try to play dumb on him, he is NOT scared of giving zeros. 

Fun fact: he is a Taylor swift and hello kitty fan (pay attention to lectures and you'll notice lol)

Honestly, I can tell you that it's pretty rough with this professor. He's just mean and doesn't explain the assignments or content well at all. his explanations can be super confusing

I wouldn't say I hate the guy, but he's just not a great teacher. If you take this course with him be ready to fail. I recommend looking for another professor.
worst teacher in FIC.. i suggest dropping his course.

If you are an incoming fic stuents, wanting to take 216 DO NOT take this prof. He will make sure your life in this course misrable with his stuttering speech, and very tough grading in the presentation

I only have one word for Steve - Discouraging. Will make his students feel embarrassed and dumb and thinks he knows it all. When you try to ask him about anything, will make 0 eye contact as if you don't exist and will brush you off. Never wrote a review but had to write one for him. Please save your grade and yourself from this being. Fr no cap.
Worst prof in the history of worst prof. Most discouraging. No mutual respect. You'll be better off with any other prof but him.

You have to get her to like you otherwise it will be bad. She expects professionalism at all time which is confusing. You cant choose your group and its as *diverse as possible* and at the end some team members do nothing and that affects you but she does not understand it. You have to complete team documents every week.
Best professor you should choose without doubt at FIC! Perfect!
Her class is not so interesting, but she will be an instructor that you feel willing to communicate with and learn from. I studied BUS 216 with her in 202301, so you can choose with confidence!

Well just make sure she likes you from the start. 
Her lectures are boring as she only reads off of ppt. She will not tell how to do the assignments exactly, only afterwards she explains how it should have been done. 
Does not bother to properly clarify questions.
Lastly, she kinda argues if you have a question which she finds not to her liking.
Real life example of a Karen.

She refuses to explain basic things saying that it isnt the way of the world Excuse me? Youre the teacher?? Oh and you give the quiz and then she explains the chapter and the slides are posted after as well

She is worst instructor that I have ever taken class at FIC . She doesnt care to provide good explanation for the assignments. And her instruction outline is not even clear . Take this class with any professor except her .
